echo: Output some string on the terminal.
ls [-f]: Lists the contents of the current directory
pwd: Displays the oath to the current working directory.
cd <directory>: Changes the current directory. '.. , . , ~' can be used.
cat <file>: Previews the contents of the file.
su <role> <password>: Allows you to gain user privileges.
get [-a] <name>: Get the value of a system variable.
set <name> <value>: Set the value of a system variable.
